br.span: Stay up to date with the latest news

div.class: inner col col24 first last id1b55d503-01fe-4010-9ed8-37a6ab85a416

h4.a: COUNTY PARKS AND SILVER COMET TRAILHEADS TO REOPEN

div.div: On Saturday, April 25, 2020 at 7:00 AM, Paulding County will reopen all County Parks and Silver Comet Trailheads, with the exception of Braly Sports Complex. Additional Info...

h4.a: Paulding Northwest Atlanta Airport Environmental Assessment

div.div: UPDATED 4/22/2020 - Paulding Northwest Atlanta Airport Release of 2.9 Acres of Airport Property Environmental Assessment Continue Reading Assessment

h4.a: Water System - Lobby and Drive-Thru Closed

div.div: The Paulding Water System lobby and drive-thru will be closed until further notice due to the current health situation. Read on...
The Touch-A-Truck event originally scheduled for April 25,2020 from 10am-12pm at Veterans Park has been cancelled... Read on...

h4.a: NOTICE - TEMPORARY CLOSING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

div.div: The Administration Building and other County Facilities will remain closed until further notice. Read on...

h4.a: Paulding County and the Cities of Dallas and Hiram all unite in response to COVID-19

div.div: Paulding County and the cities of Dallas and Hiram all unite in response to COVID -19 by implementing Declarations of Emergency. Read on...

h4.a: Chairman Carmichael Signs Ordinance 20-03 "A Declaration of a State of Emergency"

div.div: Ordinance 20-03 "A Declaration of a State of Emergency Arising Because of COVID-19; An Ordinance Taking Immediate Emergency Measures". Ordinance 20-03
The Paulding County Board of Commissioners has cancelled the following meeting for the month of April 2020. Public Notice

h4.a: Juvenile Court Hearings & Juvenile Court Fine Payments

div.div: As you are all aware, we are all working under a statewide Judicial Emergency limiting all courts to essential functions only and tolling time frames for almost everything. These are unprecedented times. Clerks direct email
Public Meeting Announcement for Paulding County's Hazard Mitigation Plan Update Project POSTPONED Read on...
The Chairman’s Corner keeps citizens connected and allows an opportunity to learn about the things going on and around our great county. Additional info...

div.class: inner col col24 first last idf08f0971-0b5c-4a9a-a796-27d01311b954

div.div:
Census Day April 1, 2020!
Every ten years, the U.S. Census Bureau is responsible for conducting the nationwide Census. The purpose of the Census is to establish an accurate count of the nation’s population. Additional Info...
The Richland Creek Reservoir (RCR) is part of the Richland Creek Reservoir Water Supply Program. Read on...
The vision of Keep Paulding Beautiful is to create an atmosphere that inspires Paulding County citizens to care for their environment in a way that impacts future generations. Additional Info...
